name: Drifting Bloom
description: A scented, hand-crafted floating candle in the form of a delicate flower. Each petal is individually sculpted from softened molding wax. Intense care and precision is given into each detail to create a simple, charming drifting bloom. Available in 13 different scents! Please remember to let me know your scent selection name in the "message to seller" note at the checkout. (If no scent is specified, it will be chosen at random!) If ordering multiple votives, be sure to specify which color goes with which scent. Example: Brown= Cappuccino Hazelnut, Brown2=Sweet Pumpkin Spice, Green=Spring Rain, etc. Asian Sandalwood Black Raspberry Vanilla Buttermint Candies Cappuccino Hazelnut Fruit Slices Green Tea Jamaica Me Crazy Love Spell Pink Sugar Spring Rain Sweet Pea Sweet Pumpkin Spice Warm Vanilla Sugar A description of each scent can be found here: Scent List

name: Classic Votive
description: Our most popular selection, the clean burning votive candle. The perfect choice for almost any occasion from a relaxing soak in the tub to a romantic night with your loved one. Burn time is around 15-20 hours. Available in 13 different scents! Please remember to let me know your scent selection name in the "message to seller" note at the checkout. (If no scent is specified, it will be chosen at random!) If ordering multiple votives, be sure to specify which color goes with which scent. Example: Brown= Cappuccino Hazelnut, Brown2=Sweet Pumpkin Spice, Green=Spring Rain, etc. Asian Sandalwood Black Raspberry Vanilla Buttermint Candies Cappuccino Hazelnut Fruit Slices Green Tea Jamaica Me Crazy Love Spell Pink Sugar Spring Rain Sweet Pea Sweet Pumpkin Spice Warm Vanilla Sugar A description of each scent can be found here: Scent List
